backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a restaurant booking system with submitBooking, getAllBookings (admin-only), and clearAllBookings (admin-only) functions, using access control authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (visual theme, header, hero section, etc.) to their corresponding source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: SEO-optimized HTML entry point with meta tags, Open Graph tags, and JSON-LD Restaurant schema markup for Pind Pahadi Restaurant Delhi.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining TanStack Router routes for five pages (Home, Menu, About, Reviews, Contact) wrapped in a Layout with Header, Footer, MobileStickyBar, and WhatsAppButton.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site-wide footer with brand info, quick navigation links, contact details (address, phone, hours), directions link, and dynamic copyright year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with bilingual restaurant branding, desktop navigation links with active state highlighting, click-to-call phone button, and a collapsible mobile hamburger menu.
A fixed bottom navigation bar for mobile devices with three actions: call, get directions, and book a table.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: A reusable star rating display component that renders filled/empty stars based on a numeric rating prop.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: A fixed floating WhatsApp button that opens a pre-filled WhatsApp chat for restaurant reservations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context and custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a `useSubmitBooking` mutation hook that calls the backend actor's `submitBooking` method with reservation form data.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for a Punjabi earthy color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: The About Us page displaying the restaurant's story, core values, and team members with supporting images and a call-to-action.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: The Contact/Book a Table page featuring a validated reservation form that submits via the `useSubmitBooking` hook, alongside contact info and an embedded Google Map.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page for Pind Pahadi restaurant featuring a hero section, featured dishes, why-choose-us highlights, testimonials, and a Google Maps embed with contact/navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/Menu.tsx: Menu page displaying categorized food items (Starters, Main Course, Beverages, Combos) with tab-based filtering, item details, and a call-to-order button.
frontend/src/pages/Reviews.tsx: Customer reviews page showing a 4.8-star rating summary with a star distribution breakdown and detailed testimonial cards from individual customers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom brand color palette (brown, mustard, red, cream), custom fonts (Poppins, Noto Sans Devanagari), box shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines the full project state for Pind Pahadi Restaurant Delhi's multi-page website, including architecture notes, design system (colors, fonts, bilingual support), required images, and a detailed list of existing implemented features across all pages.
